sentences.en: Ferris wore a heavy knit sweater.
sentences.cn: 费里斯身着一件织得厚厚的毛衣。

sentences.en: I was wearing false eyelashes and a sweater two sizes too small.
sentences.cn: 我戴着假睫毛，穿着小了两号的毛衣。

sentences.en: It does serve the purpose to put on another woollen sweater.
Keep handy a lightweight sweater or cardigan.
sentences.cn: 手边备一件薄的套头毛衣或开襟毛衫。

sentences.en: My sweater shrank in the wash.
Peter decided on a blue sweater.
sentences.cn: 彼得选定了一件蓝色的运动衫.

sentences.en: She decided on a beige cashmere sweater.
sentences.cn: 她决定穿一件米色羊绒毛衣.

sentences.en: She slipped into the sweater and dashed out of the door.
sentences.cn: 她匆匆穿上毛衣,冲出门去.

sentences.en: She stood up and brushed the crumbs from her sweater.
sentences.cn: 她站起身掸掉了毛衣上的面包屑。

sentences.en: She was fashionably turned out in cream trousers and a red sweater.
sentences.cn: 她穿着米色长裤和红套衫,打扮得很入时.

sentences.en: She was wearing black slacks and a white sweater.
sentences.cn: 她身穿黑色便裤和白色毛衣。

sentences.en: She wore a thick tartan skirt and a red cashmere sweater.
sentences.cn: 她穿了一条厚厚的格子呢裙和一件红色羊绒衫。

sentences.en: Wearing a sweater will keep us warm.
You must be boiling in that sweater!
sentences.cn: 你穿着那件毛衣一定很热！

words.tran_cn: 出汗的；吃力的；使人出汗的
出汗；辛苦工作；懊恼；结水珠
使出汗；流出；使干苦活；剥削；藉出汗减轻；焦急地期待
毛线衣，运动衫；大量出汗的人，发汗剂

trans.tran_cn: 毛衣，运动衫，出汗（过多）的人，发汗剂，榨取别人血汗的人（或工厂、公司等）
trans.tran_en: a piece of warm wool or cotton clothing with long sleeves, which covers the top half of your body
a piece of warm wool or cotton clothing with long sleeves, which covers the top half of your body
